description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the Microsoft brokering file system elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-26213), follow these steps:

1. Apply the security update referenced in KB-5036910 to your systems to remedy the identified vulnerability.
2. Ensure all affected systems are properly rebooted to complete the installation of the update.
3. Review user permissions on affected systems to prevent unauthorized access that could exploit this vulnerability.

**Details**:
- This update addresses an untrusted pointer dereference issue resulting in potential elevation of privilege, allowing an attacker to execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the user.
- Make sure your systems meet any prerequisites listed in the KB article related to this update.

For more information and the update, visit: https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2024-26213.
